alert.note: Alert for Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 5:15PM CST until December 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 515 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Brownsville-Bawcomville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, West Monroe, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Brownsville-Bawcom, Richwood, Fondale, Caderville, Pine Grove, Luna, and Lapine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
